function.name: mcrypt_cbc
function.description: Encrypt/decrypt data in CBC mode.

function.name: mcrypt_cfb
function.description: Encrypt/decrypt data in CFB mode.

function.name: mcrypt_create_iv
function.description: Create an initialization vector (IV) from a random source.

function.name: mcrypt_decrypt
function.description: Decrypts crypttext with given parameters.

function.name: mcrypt_ecb
function.description: Deprecated: Encrypt/decrypt data in ECB mode.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_get_algorithms_name
function.description: Returns the name of the opened algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_get_block_size
function.description: Returns the blocksize of the opened algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_get_iv_size
function.description: Returns the size of the IV of the opened algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_get_key_size
function.description: Returns the maximum supported keysize of the opened mode.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_get_modes_name
function.description: Returns the name of the opened mode.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_get_supported_key_sizes
function.description: Returns an array with the supported keysizes of the opened algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_is_block_algorithm_mode
function.description: Checks whether the encryption of the opened mode works on blocks.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_is_block_algorithm
function.description: Checks whether the algorithm of the opened mode is a block algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_is_block_mode
function.description: Checks whether the opened mode outputs blocks.

function.name: mcrypt_enc_self_test
function.description: This function runs a self test on the opened module.

function.name: mcrypt_encrypt
function.description: Encrypts plaintext with given parameters.

function.name: mcrypt_generic_deinit
function.description: This function deinitializes an encryption module.

function.name: mcrypt_generic_end
function.description: This function terminates encryption.

function.name: mcrypt_generic_init
function.description: This function initializes all buffers needed for encryption.

function.name: mcrypt_generic
function.description: This function encrypts data.

function.name: mcrypt_get_block_size
function.description: Get the block size of the specified cipher.

function.name: mcrypt_get_cipher_name
function.description: Get the name of the specified cipher.

function.name: mcrypt_get_iv_size
function.description: Returns the size of the IV belonging to a specific cipher/mode combination.

function.name: mcrypt_get_key_size
function.description: Get the key size of the specified cipher.

function.name: mcrypt_list_algorithms
function.description: Get an array of all supported ciphers.

function.name: mcrypt_list_modes
function.description: Get an array of all supported modes.

function.name: mcrypt_module_close
function.description: Close the mcrypt module.

function.name: mcrypt_module_get_algo_block_size
function.description: Returns the blocksize of the specified algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_module_get_algo_key_size
function.description: Returns the maximum supported keysize of the opened mode.

function.name: mcrypt_module_get_supported_key_sizes
function.description: Returns an array with the supported keysizes of the opened algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_module_is_block_algorithm_mode
function.description: returns if the specified module is a block algorithm or not.

function.name: mcrypt_module_is_block_algorithm
function.description: This function checks whether the specified algorithm is a block algorithm.

function.name: mcrypt_module_is_block_mode
function.description: Returns if the specified mode outputs blocks or not.

function.name: mcrypt_module_open
function.description: Opens the module of the algorithm and the mode to be used.

function.name: mcrypt_module_self_test
function.description: This function runs a self test on the specified module.

function.name: mcrypt_ofb
function.description: Encrypt/decrypt data in OFB mode.

function.name: mdecrypt_generic
function.description: Decrypt data.
